bibdata.title: Disclosures on magnetic tape handler, focus detector, multi-pen recorder, signal averaging filter, electrostatic RMS voltmeter, back-up ring for O-rings, and low temperature solid state thermometer. Editors: David Robbins and Alvin J. Englert.

Disclosures on magnetic tape handler, focus detector, multi-pen recorder, signal averaging filter, electrostatic RMS voltmeter, back-up ring for O-rings, and low temperature solid state thermometer. Editors: David Robbins and Alvin J. Englert.
